description:
The more fun it is to apply, the more likely you are to use it. Sun Bum’s Mineral SPF 30 aerosol sunscreen is easy to use, goes on sheer and has a dry touch.

  • Broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection
  • Water-resistant rating of 80 minutes
  • Moisturizing zinc based formula (non-nano)
  • Gluten, paraben, oxybenzone and octinoxate free
  • Oil free
  • Cruelty free and 100% vegan
  • Ingredients: zinc oxide 14.0%, water, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, butyloctyl salicylate, carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil, caprylic/capric triglyceride, bentonite, methyl dihydroabietate, fragrance, cetearyl alcohol, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, glycerin, microcrystalline cellulose, gum, cocoglucoside, caprylhydroxamic acid, caprylyl glycol, jojoba esters, bisabolol, tocopherol and polyhydroxystearic acid
name: Sun Bum Mineral SPF 30 Spray 170g
